idea:
We're creating India's largest B2B Marketplace for the Hospitality Industry. So hotels, restaurants, caterers will have a one stop shop to buy everything they need. They can add products from several suppliers to the cart, make a single payment for multiple invoices, use the offline credit relationships and discover new suppliers as well.


We enable a smart credit score for the customers for the suppliers to have a better-informed decision about extending credit.


The Beta is active on beta1.infimenu.com and we're due for launch in early Jun'21.
name: PROMARKT TECH PRIVATE LIMITED
